value: 20 Whitfield Blvd, Cranbourne West, 3977, VIC, Australia

3713 - Truck and Bus Bodies Summary > CIMC VEHICLE AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover truck trailers. The company is involved in the import but not export of goods. CIMC VEHICLE AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is headquartered in Cranbourne West, Victoria. It is headed by director Zhengxiang Ding. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $33.03 million. Its net profit totalled $3.17 million. CIMC VEHICLE AUSTRALIA PTY LTD forms part of the manufacturing industry sector.
